body:
Just to ensure we don't start heading 6 directions at once, I am  
continuing discussions with Peter and LBL regarding transfer of the  
radiance-online.org domain to an LBL server.  This won't mean that  
anyone will be shut out of content management -- quite the contrary.   
We will need all the help we can get putting this together and  
developing it further, the hope being to collate information that's  
currently scattered.  As a start, we plan to transfer what currently  
lives on PAB's server to an LBL-hosted site.  Once this is stable,  
we'll invite others to join in content creation and management, and  
if someone wants to mirror the site in Europe, that would be great.   
We're trying to avoid the situation of burdening people with IT  
management that isn't all that fun in the long run, while encouraging  
others to participate in the content, which is the rewarding part.


-Greg
